mapper.select: SELECT mem_no AS memNo, mem_id AS memId, mem_name AS memName, mem_email AS memEmail, mem_pwd AS memPwd, mem_addr AS memAddr, mem_tel AS memTel, mem_regdate AS memRegdate, mem_status AS memStatus FROM MEMBER WHERE mem_no = #{memNo}
mapper.update: UPDATE MEMBER SET mem_name = #{memName}, mem_email = #{memEmail}, mem_pwd = #{memPwd}, mem_addr = #{memAddr}, mem_tel = #{memTel} WHERE mem_no = #{memNo}
